short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly add candidates and clients contacts from your LinkedIn account to your Hire Genius platform

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Elevate your recruiting efficiency with the Hire Genius Sync Chrome extension for LinkedIn. Seamlessly integrate your LinkedIn discoveries with your Hire Genius CRM right from your browser. Explore the power of:

‚ú® Smart Detection: Instantly identify LinkedIn profiles in your Hire Genius account, facilitating swift record creation or update.

üë§ Candidate Records:

Import key details: experience, education, languages, and contact information.

Associate candidates with existing Hire Genius Jobs and Talent Pools.

Enrich candidate profiles with custom tags: Domain, Industry, Job Titles, Skills.

Capture additional insights: gender, candidate type, source.

Edit and refine contact details seamlessly.

ü§ù Client Records:

Link clients to existing Hire Genius Hiring Pools effortlessly.

Enhance client profiles with tailored tags: Domain, Industry, Job Titles, Skills.

Include vital information: corporate level, client role type.

Streamline contact details editing for accurate record-keeping.

Effortlessly manage your talent pipeline and client relationships. Experience the synergy of LinkedIn and Hire Genius Sync. Download now and take your recruiting to new heights!
